ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Today's patch message.
ygData.msgSnippet: lol no actually MoK is much better in exp groups as opposed to raids.  our clerics actually wouldn t mind the nerf if it was unresistable.  as it stood before
ygData.messageBody:
lol no actually MoK is much better in exp groups as opposed to raids. our
clerics actually wouldn't mind the nerf if it was unresistable. as it stood
before it would take several attempts to get it to land, which means with
the resist rate and 5 min recast it is now useless.

and btw, Phara Dar is TOUGH =)

Shada


> It was probably used by FoH or Afterlife to kill a dragon in Veeshan's
> Peak without the predetermined requisate number of deaths occuring. As
> killing a dragon without the prescribed number of deaths occuring
> violates the Vision[tm] it was necessary to remove this spell from the
> game.
